sources.title: Night Into Day | Full Movie | Post Nuclear Drama
sources.description:
Night Into Day - A couple in the middle of a divorce are stuck together on the outskirts of a nuclear strike in Los Angeles.  A thought-provoking, suspenseful drama that examines what an actual response of a divorcing couple might look like during what could be the end of the world.
2020.  Stars: Justin Gaston, April Gooding, Christopher Mychael Watson
